source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_00<tab>Giott...<var 1A 02 /var>isn't drinking<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_00<tab>トメラの村のジオットは、酒も呑まずに佇んでいる。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_01<tab>You snap Giott from a melancholy reverie, prompting the dwarf to remember that Sophrosyne recently paid visit to Tomra and may still be in the area. Giott theorizes, based upon your recent vision, that the Virtue reflexively heals those sin eaters it recognizes as helmless dwarves─those of Lamitt's people who joined her in exile─and concludes that adding a helm to any eaters you would prefer remain dead may be enough to deter it from doing so. Though this seems almost too easy, it is true that sin eaters are simple beings, with no real powers of cognition that might allow them to see through even rudimentary deception. In any case, there is only one way to find out.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_01<tab>冒険者のいない間に、村にソープロシュネーが現れ、罪喰いを再生していったらしい。ジオットはそれを見て、ソープロシュネーは罪喰いと化した元患者だけを再生していると予想。ソープロシュネーに「ドワーフの兜」を被せれば、再生を行わなくなるはずだと語る。おびき寄せる餌にするため、スクリー山地の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAB9601 /var>」で見渡し、現れたはぐれ罪喰いを討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_02<tab>You locate a pair of sin eaters, and summarily put them down as potential bait for Sophrosyne. As you well know by now, however, littering the entire area with corpses would be more likely to attract the Virtue's attention─and also somewhat cathartic.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_02<tab>はぐれ罪喰いを討伐した。スクリー山地の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAB9701 /var>」で見渡し、更にはぐれ罪喰いを討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_03<tab>Now that you have dispatched a multitude of sin eaters and given Giott ample time to do the same, the time has come to reunite. Hopefully the dwarf has been able to keep at least one kill reasonably intact.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_03<tab>必要なだけのはぐれ罪喰いを討伐した。スクリー山地で「ジオット」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_04<tab>As hoped, Sophrosyne appears to revive one of the sin eaters you left as lure. Upon engaging the newly risen eater in battle, Giott instructs you to use your spellcraft to put the thing to sleep, and unceremoniously crams its head into a helmet once you do. This does, in fact, prevent Sophrosyne from automatically healing the eater, and thankfully proceeds to work several more times as additional lesser eaters make themselves known. When, at last, all that remains is to defeat the Virtue itself, Giott raises the sole remaining spare helm brought for this purpose with a triumphant shout─and is promptly hurled backward by a sorcerous blow, the helm blasted to smithereens. With no other choice, she brazenly removes her own helm, revealing her face for the first time. Crowned with the helm of your courageous comrade, Sophrosyne is finally vulnerable, and the pair of you destroy it as one.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_04<tab>ジオットの策が見事にはまり、ソープロシュネーの討伐に成功した。スクリー山地で、討ち取ったソープロシュネーの最期を見届けよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_05<tab>Sophrosyne leaves behind a damaged crystal, one which you recognize immediately. As you pick it up, it resonates, calling forth a manifestation of Lamitt's memories. Giott calls out to her, though she is long beyond hearing, desperate to assure her that her legacy is not forgotten. And while the real Lamitt may not have known that, someday, one amongst her kin would at last recognize her for the noble woman she had been, her shade's words make clear that she was, at least, at peace with her sacrifice in the end.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_05<tab>光のクリスタルの欠片からラミットが現れ、生前の想いを聞くことができた。スクリー山地で「ジオット」と再度話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_06<tab>You speak to Giott, who confirms what you suspected─having broken her people's taboo by taking off her helm, she no longer feels as if she can return to Tomra. Having seen how inflexible dwarven traditions can be, and knowing how much they mean to Giott, you know it is not your place to disagree, and so follow her to the Crystarium instead.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_06<tab>ジオットも兜を脱ぎ素顔を晒したことで、故郷を離れ生きることになった。クリスタリウムの彷徨う階段亭で「ジオット」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_07<tab>When you join Giott at the Wandering Stairs, she appears to be faring better than one might have expected, given the circumstances, and is certainly cheered for your presence. She tells you that while she still values tradition, leaving her village has given her an appreciation for the wider world and all that is precious in it─an appreciation that Lamitt, too, once shared. As you trade fond farewells, it is clear that, much like the woman she has come to admire, she will bear her burdens without breaking under their weight.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_SEQ_07<tab>ラミットに追放を言い渡した当時の最長老は、ジオットの曽祖父だった。ジオットは里を離れたことで、多くの人と酒を酌み交わし、冒険者とも出会い、人情の大切さを知ったという。そうして誇り高き追放者となった彼女と杯を交わしたくなったら、またクリスタリウムを訪ねよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_TODO_01<tab>Slay sin eaters at the next destination.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAB9701 /var>で見渡し、罪喰いを更に討伐

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_TODO_02<tab>Report to Giott.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_TODO_02<tab>ジオットと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_TODO_03<tab>Report to Giott.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_TODO_03<tab>ジオットと話す

target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_TODO_05<tab>彷徨う階段亭のジオットと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_001<tab>Oh. Hello there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_001<tab>……お前さんか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_Q1_000_000<tab>何と声をかける？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A1_000_001<tab>Lali-ho!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A1_000_001<tab>ラリホー！！！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A1_000_002<tab>Hey, you hammer-brained imbecile! Your mother was a hobgoblin!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A1_000_002<tab>お前の母ちゃんホブゴブリン！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_003<tab>Wha─ I mean, lali-ho!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_003<tab>……！？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_004<tab>Oh! And a lali-ho to you!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_004<tab>ラ、ラリホー！！！！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_100_004<tab>I'm impressed. You knowing to give me a “lali-ho” just now shows that you've really picked up on the finer points of dwarven culture.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_100_004<tab>まさか、ドワーフの生き様をお前さんに教えられるとはの！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_005<tab>Some of that may be accurate, but my mother most definitely was <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> a hobgoblin! Are you sure you ain't getting her confused with your own mother?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_005<tab>な、な、な……なんじゃと！？
ワシへの罵詈雑言はともかく、母ちゃんは関係ないじゃろう！
この<var 09 E948 ((アホ面ヒュム)) ((高慢エルフ)) ((破廉恥ドワーフ)) ((猫もどきのミステル)) ((筋肉ゴリゴリガルジェント)) ((鱗まみれのドラン)) ((通さないロンゾ)) ((ピョンピョコ兎のヴィース)) /var><var 08 E905 ((娘)) ((野郎)) /var>め！！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_006<tab>Ha! Hammer-brained!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_006<tab>ダッハッハッ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_100_006<tab>I never thought I'd see the day when you took to friendly insults, partner!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_100_006<tab>まさか、お前さんに罵倒で活を入れられるとはな！
さすが我が相棒じゃわい！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_007<tab>That really helped, thanks! I was so busy dwelling on that business with Lamitt that I almost forgot the news I had for you about Sophrosyne.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_007<tab>よしきた、気分を切り替えるぞい！
ソープロシュネー退治こそが、ワシらの目的じゃからの！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_008<tab>You remember that sin eater I killed in the Blightwarrens? Well, while you were gone, Sophrosyne showed up to revive it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_008<tab>実は、お前さんが来る前に、村でひと騒動あっての。
ソープロシュネーが現れて、前回ワシが仕留めた罪喰いを、
再生の力で復活させて連れ去ったんじゃ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_009<tab>Seeing that convinced me...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_009<tab>それを見て、ワシは確信した……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_010<tab>I mean, you remember how I was wondering why Sophrosyne don't revive every sin eater we take down, right?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_010<tab>罪喰いは、たくさんいるが、
ソープロシュネーは必ず癒やしに現れるわけではない。
救われる罪喰いと、無視される罪喰いの差とは何なのか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_011<tab>Well, we learned from your vision that the dwarves that Lamitt cured of stoneblight went into exile of their own volition.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_011<tab>お前さんが視た過去によれば、ラミットに癒やされた者たちは、
自ら追放の道を選び、この集落を出ていった。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_012<tab>As you can see, the village was spared the worst of the Flood. But the folks that left, well...probably weren't. Which means...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_012<tab>この近辺は「光の氾濫」の影響を免れたが、
追放者たちが助からなかった可能性は極めて高いじゃろう。
つまり……

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_Q2_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A2_000_001<tab>They became sin eaters.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A2_000_001<tab>元患者たちは罪喰いになった！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A2_000_002<tab>Sophrosyne is healing the same people Lamitt did!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A2_000_002<tab>ソープロシュネーは元患者たちを癒やしている！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_014<tab>Right─it's the only thing that makes sense. Those poor souls couldn't go back to the village, so they got caught in the Flood. They became sin eaters. And Sophrosyne is still saving them. Even now.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_014<tab>そのとおりじゃ！
追放者たちは、不幸にも罪喰いと化してしまい、
今もソープロシュネーは、彼らを救い続けているッ！！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_015<tab>...And that gave me an idea! As we figured before, Sophrosyne ain't alive. But Lamitt wanted so badly to heal those dwarves that it's still following suit─like a reflex its body can't forget.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_015<tab>ならば、倒す方法は簡単じゃ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_016<tab>The last time Lamitt saw those folks she healed, they were helmless, leaving their home for the last time. She probably never forgot the sight of them. And so Sophrosyne goes around healing helmless dwarves to this day. You see the solution, right? Helms!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_016<tab>やっこさんに「ドワーフの兜」を被せる！
掟に従って生きる者の証たる兜を被せてしまえば、
治療すべき追放者ではなくなり、再生の対象外となるのじゃ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_Q3_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A3_000_001<tab>Incredible! That's the stupidest thing I've ever heard!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A3_000_001<tab>そんなバカな！？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A3_000_002<tab>So simple...it's brilliant!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A3_000_002<tab>完璧な作戦じゃ！！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_018<tab>It sounds too simple, I know. But it'll work, I tell you! Sophrosyne is healing helmless dwarves on pure instinct. Anyone wearing a helm, it won't think twice about─seeing as it don't actually think at all.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_018<tab>バカなどであるものか！
どう考えても完璧な作戦じゃ！！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_019<tab>Isn't it just? Not as brilliant as my beard, maybe, but few things are.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_019<tab>ダッハッハッ！
もっと褒めるがいい、おヒゲが素敵な知恵者とな！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_020<tab>Now, whether clapping a helm onto Sophrosyne will keep it from healing <var 1A 02 /var>itself<var 1A 01 /var>, I can't say. It'll depend on whether the thing sees itself as just another helmless dwarf. It don't seem to have much in the way of self-awareness, so I think it's worth a shot.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_020<tab>まあ、賛成しようが反対されようが、
ワシは試すつもりじゃったがな！
試してみて失敗したら、とんずらカマして再考するのみよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_021<tab>Fortunately, we won't need to wait to find out. It came around not too long before you did, so if we kill the right sort of sin eaters, it should still be close enough to notice. Let's get to it!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_021<tab>ソープロシュネーが現れてから、さほど時間は経っていない。
この近辺で、はぐれ罪喰いを倒して、やつをおびき寄せるぞい！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_025<tab>You go and find some sin eaters─I'll grab a few spare helms.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_025<tab>お前さん、何をやっておる？
はぐれ罪喰いを探して、おびき寄せるエサにせんかい！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_150<tab>Right. So we've got our eaters, we've got our helms...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_150<tab>よし、エサの準備は完了したようじゃな。
こちらも「ドワーフの兜」を、たくさん用意してきたぞい。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_151<tab>And now, we wait. Once Sophrosyne shows up, we'll test out a helm on the bait first─that'll also save us from having to kill it over and over.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_151<tab>たとえ、ザコの罪喰いどもを引き連れていようとも、
この兜さえ付けた状態で倒せば、再生されないはずじゃ！
さあ、身を潜めて待ち伏せるぞい……！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_050_151<tab>This feels familiar.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_050_151<tab>ふぅ……。
この待ち時間が、なんともじれったいのう……。
武者震いが止まらんぞい。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_100_151<tab>(-Giott-)Aha! At last!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_100_151<tab>(-ジオットの囁き声-)きよった……！
ソープロシュネーじゃぞ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_200_151<tab>A bit less toppling over on your part, this time, if you please.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_200_151<tab>これにて、決戦の舞台は整った……
ワシの完璧な作戦に従い、やっこさんを討ち果たすぞい！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>Slay Sophrosyne once and for all!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>ソープロシュネーを倒せ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_000<tab>Wait for it to be distracted with healing the other one. Then we strike.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_000<tab>ワシの作戦を試すためにも、
ヤツが雑魚を再生するのを待つんじゃ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_001<tab>Now! Charge!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_001<tab>よし、雑魚が再生した……！
行くぞい！　<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_002<tab>As I said, we'll try this on the lesser eater first.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_002<tab>まずは、雑魚の罪喰いで作戦を試すぞい！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_003<tab>I'll give it a bit of a pummeling, then you put it to sleep with Repose. That'll give me the chance to slip the helm on.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_003<tab>罪喰いを弱らせてから、お前さんが「リポーズ」で眠らせる……！
そうしたら、ワシが「必殺兜被し」をかましてやるわい！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_004<tab>I doubt it'll take to napping mid-battle unless it's nearly ready to drop, so wait for my signal, you hear?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_004<tab>繰り返すが、弱らせねば「リポーズ」は効かんぞい！
忘れるでないぞ、相棒！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_005<tab>It's time, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Cast Repose!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_005<tab>よし、そろそろ頃合いじゃ……！
「リポーズ」で、敵を眠らせてくれい！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_006<tab>Alright, let's get that ugly mug of yours covered up.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_006<tab>見事じゃ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！
いくぞい、「必殺兜被し」じゃああああああ！！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_007<tab>Ha! Ain't that a sight?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_007<tab>ダッハッハッ！　見たか、罪喰いめ！
これで、お前さんも立派なドワーフじゃな！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_008<tab>Listen, when I said “put it to sleep,” that wasn't a euphemism. If we kill it, Sophrosyne'll keep bringing it back!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_008<tab>なにをやっとるんじゃ！　再生されてしまったではないか！
いいか、敵を弱らせたら「リポーズ」を忘れんでくれい！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_009<tab>Looks like it worked─it's not reviving the thing. Now we─ Uh oh.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_009<tab>よし、これで再生は封じたぞい！
次はソープロシュネーを……って、なんじゃ！？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_010<tab>Lucky for us, I brought extra helms in case of emergency!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_010<tab>増援とは、やってくれるわい！
しかーし、こんな事もあろうかと兜はまだある！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_011<tab>Alright, <var 1A 02 /var>now<var 1A 01 /var> we can─ Oh, wicked <var 1A 02 /var>white<var 1A 01 /var> that's annoying.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_011<tab>ハァ、ハァ、ハァ……ようやく片付いたかの……
次こそソープロシュネーを……って、またかーい！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_012<tab>Are these ones maybe...trying to protect it? Does some part of them remember?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_012<tab>もしや、こやつらソープロシュネーを、
守ろうとしておるのか？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_013<tab>Well, no time to ponder that now. Helms away!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_013<tab>ええい、片っ端から兜を被せてやる！
頼むぞい、相棒！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_014<tab>It looks like they've...<pant>...stopped coming. Now we hit Sophrosyne with everything we've got!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_014<tab>ヒィ、フゥ、ヒィ、フゥ……手間取らせよって……！
あとはソープロシュネーを、集中攻撃するだけじゃぞい！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_100<tab>It's time, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We can end this.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_100<tab>行くぞ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！
今度こそ、ソープロシュネーをシバき倒すぞい！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_101<tab>Looks like I was right─no healing for you! Ha!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_101<tab>ダッハッハッ！　自分を回復することもできんようじゃな！
作戦は大成功じゃ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_102<tab>Oh, right. Lamitt was a big damn hero. No surprise that she knows a few dangerous tricks.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_102<tab>ヌゥ……腐っても英雄と称えられた「光の戦士」か……！
癒やしの術を封じられてなお、やりおるわい！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_103<tab>Come here! Quickly!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_103<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、こっちじゃ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_104<tab>I knew you'd have my back!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_104<tab>ふぅ、助かったぞい！　さすがは相棒じゃ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_105<tab>Here it comes. Try not to die!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_105<tab>ここで負けるわけにはいかんぞい！
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、正念場というやつじゃ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_106<tab>You don't scare me! I have a giant hammer!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_BATTLETALK_000_106<tab>そんなこけおどし、恐れはせんぞい！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_152<tab>Perfect! Now...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_152<tab>今が好機じゃぁぁぁ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_153<tab>Hold still!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_153<tab>これを被れぇぇぇ！！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_154<tab>Waugh!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_154<tab>ぬおおおおおッ！？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_155<tab>Oof. Thanks.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_155<tab>た、たすかったわい……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_156<tab>The helm got it even worse than I did just then. And it was our last one.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_156<tab>じゃが、今の衝撃で最後の兜が壊れてしもうたわい。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_157<tab>I hate to say it, but this ain't going as well as I hoped. If we had even one more helm, I could try again, but...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_157<tab>やっこさんも、完全復活したようじゃな。
これでは埒が明かん……。
兜がなければ……

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_158<tab>Wait. We do have one more helm...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_158<tab>そうか、兜なら…………！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_159<tab>Just the one!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_159<tab>いっくぞぉぉぉぉい！！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_160<tab>Well, well... Looks like it's time to take this eater down, once and for all. Together!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_160<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！
あとは、ふたりでこやつを……
ソープロシュネーを、シバき倒すぞい！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_161<tab>Ha! Take that, you pasty bastard!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_161<tab>うおおおおおッ！
ソープロシュネー、討ち取ったりッ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_162<tab>What's that you've got there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_162<tab>どうした、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
何かみつけたのか？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_163<tab>Some kind of crystal?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_163<tab>クリスタルの……欠片かの？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_164<tab>(-???-)Tradition wouldn't have saved her. That's why I left.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_164<tab>(-悲しげな女性の声-)掟に従うだけじゃ、助けられなかった。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_165<tab>(-Lamitt's Shade-)I left, and I traveled. I met Ardbert. We found our companions. And together, we searched.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_165<tab>(-ラミットの幻影-)だから、里を出た。
そして、あの人に……アルバートに出会い、
仲間たちを加えて、冒険の旅を続けた…………。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_166<tab>Are you...her? Lamitt? I... Listen, I called you a disgrace, before, and...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_166<tab>お前さん、ラミットなのか……？
ワ、ワシは、お前さんのことを……破廉恥者などと……

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_167<tab>(-Lamitt's Shade-)My journey was not an easy one. To save my sister, to save them all, I faced a thousand thousand foes.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_167<tab>(-ラミットの幻影-)妹を……ドヴェルグ病のみんなを助けるためなら、
厳しい旅路も、辛い戦いも耐え抜いたわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_168<tab>I know! I understand, now! And I'm so...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_168<tab>わかっとる……今の、ワシはわかっとる！
じゃから……！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_169<tab>(-Lamitt's Shade-)But as I did, I learned. How wide this world is. How beautiful. How cruel. And how much I wanted to protect it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_169<tab>(-ラミットの幻影-)それに……旅を通じて、私は知った。
世界の広さ、美しさ……そして、残酷さ……。
だから、私は……守りたかった。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_170<tab>(-Lamitt's Shade-)Perhaps it should have been easy for me, then. To give up my home forever, for a greater cause. It wasn't. It hurt so much...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_170<tab>(-ラミットの幻影-)そのためになら、私は故郷を捨てもした……。
辛かった、本当に……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_171<tab>But you bore it! You forgave them! You survived...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_171<tab>もう、いいんじゃ……！
終わったんじゃ、お前さんの旅は終わったんじゃよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_172<tab>(-Lamitt's Shade-)Yes, it hurt, but I survived. Because they were there. Because <var 1A 02 /var>he<var 1A 01 /var> was there.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_172<tab>(-ラミットの幻影-)辛かったけど、耐えられた……。
あの人がいたから……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_173<tab>(-Lamitt's Shade-)Ardbert, you stubborn idiot. You sweet boy. You never did understand what you meant to me...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_LAMITT_000_173<tab>(-ラミットの幻影-)アルバート……頼りなくて……
でも、ひたむきで、諦めが悪くて……
ただただ優しいあなたを、私は…………

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_174<tab>Rest well, Lamitt. You were the best of us.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_174<tab>おやすみ、ラミット……
愛に生きた思慮深き癒し手よ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_200<tab>We did it─I can hardly believe it!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_200<tab>ついに、ワシらはやり遂げた……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_201<tab>This calls for a drink at the Crystarium, don't you think?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_201<tab>さ、クリスタリウムに帰るぞい？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_202<tab>If that silence is you wondering if I want to go home─well, I can't. I showed my face to you, didn't I? Broke our rules.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_202<tab>……故郷の村に戻らないのが不思議か？
ま、ワシもこうして、家族ではないお前さんに、
素顔を晒してしまったからには、掟破りじゃからの。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_203<tab>So I'm thinking I'll give Lamitt's way a try. Live proud as an exile, just like all the other folks that she saved.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_203<tab>かつて、ラミットに救われ、
自らの足で故郷を去った人々のように、
誇り高き追放者として生きてみせるぞい……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_204<tab>Aw, don't make that face. It's nothing that a little ale won't solve!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_204<tab>ほれほれ、そんな顔をするでない。
帰るぞい、我らがクリスタリウムに……！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_250<tab><gulp> <gulp> <gulp> Ahhh. That's the stuff!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_250<tab>ング、ング、ング……プハァ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_251<tab>Er, can I help you? You're staring─<var 1A 02 /var>really<var 1A 01 /var> staring. Do you know you're doing that?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_251<tab>ん……どうした相棒……
ワシの顔なんぞを、ジロジロと見よって。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_Q4_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_Q4_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A4_000_001<tab>Exactly how much have you had to drink?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A4_000_001<tab>結局、酒呑みだな

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A4_000_002<tab>I'm glad that you're here. Helm or no.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_A4_000_002<tab>素顔のほうがいいと思う

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_253<tab>Well, I lost count─so about as much as usual. Ha! I may be an exile, but I'm still a dwarf. And don't you forget it!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_253<tab>自ら追放者となることを選んだと言っても、
生まれがドワーフであることに、変わりはなし。
ならば、乾杯、ラリホー、もう一杯じゃ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_254<tab>Ha! Looks like you finally figured out how to tell a joke! Now's the part where I stare all misty-eyed into the distance, right?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_254<tab>ダッハッハッ！
お前さんも、ついに冗談を理解したようじゃな！
そんなことを言っても、ラミットのようにホダされんぞい？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_255<tab>Wha─ Are you sure!? Because I, well... Oh. Ohhh. You're joking, aren't you? For a moment there, I thought, er...never mind.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_255<tab>な、な、な……！？
何を言い出すんじゃ～！
あやうく、本気にするところじゃったぞい！！！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_256<tab>Anyway, there's something I've been wanting to tell you. Firstly, well...you've been following along with my crazy plans this whole time, but I never really said how much I appreciate your help with Sophrosyne─and Lamitt. Thank you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_256<tab>ともかく、ソープロシュネーを討伐できたのは、
お前さんの協力あってこそ……。
これまで礼を言う機会がなかったが、感謝してるぞい。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_257<tab>And...I think you deserve to know something else, too. You know the elder who exiled Lamitt? That was my great-grandfather.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_257<tab>……それから、お前さんには話しておこうと思うんじゃが、
ラミットに追放を言い渡した当時の最長老な……
アレは、ワシの曽祖父じゃ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_258<tab>He's remembered as the greatest warrior of our kind. I always wanted to be just like him. To be strong, honorable, protect our traditions.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_258<tab>一族最強と謳われた名戦士でな……。
ワシも、彼を目標として修行に励んできたんじゃ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_259<tab>But Lamitt, she saved so many from their suffering. Us dwarves might not even be here today if she hadn't cured stoneblight...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_259<tab>それが、多数の病人どころか、
一族の未来そのものを救ったとさえ言えるラミットを、
永久に故郷と切り離す、そんな冷たい判断を下していた……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_260<tab>And he took away her home. Forever. It's hard to see that as anything other than cruel.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_260<tab>掟は大切じゃ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_261<tab>Tradition is important. But it's not the only important thing. Kindness, empathy, love─this world and the living, breathing people in it─they matter more. That's what I learned from all the folks I shared drinks with. From Lamitt. And from you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_261<tab>じゃが、人情も大切じゃ。
ワシは里を出て、このクリスタリウムで多くの人と酒を酌み交わし、
何よりお前さんと出会い、そのことを学んだつもりじゃ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_262<tab>And I intend to keep learning. Here, in this city. With my face plain for all to see, and my head held high.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_262<tab>ワシは、誇り高き追放者として、
しばらく、この街で生きてみるつもりじゃよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_263<tab>So you know where to find me, next time you want to share a drink!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_263<tab>じゃから、お前さんも、呑みたくなったら、
いつでもワシを訪ねるがいいぞい！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_264<tab>I know our job is done. But you'll always have a place at my side, you hear?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA251_03272_GIOTT_000_264<tab>乾杯、ラリホー、もう一杯！
ソープロシュネーの討伐は終わったが、
ワシとお前さんは、いつまでも最高の相棒じゃからな！
